instructors.name: Dr. Angela Yu
instructors.title: Senior Software Engineer & Educator
instructors.bio: Former lead developer at Google with 12+ years of experience. I've taught over 100,000 students worldwide and I'm passionate about making complex topics simple.

instructors.name: Gary Simon
instructors.title: Product Designer & Figma Expert
instructors.bio: Award-winning product designer with 15 years of experience. I've worked with Fortune 500 companies and startups alike, leading design teams and building innovative products.

instructors.name: Jose Portilla
instructors.title: Data Scientist & ML Engineer
instructors.bio: Data scientist with a background in statistics and machine learning. I combine academic rigor with practical industry experience to teach data science effectively.

instructors.name: Sarah Johnson
instructors.title: Business Strategy Consultant
instructors.bio: Former McKinsey consultant with 10+ years of experience helping Fortune 500 companies develop winning strategies. Harvard MBA graduate.

instructors.name: Jenny Wilson
instructors.title: Communication Coach & TEDx Speaker
instructors.bio: Professional speaker and communication coach with 8+ years of experience. I've coached executives, entrepreneurs, and professionals to become confident speakers.
